ko: 흐음... 건방진 인간 녀석들! 도저히 참을 수 없다!
en: Hmm... Arrogant humans! I won't forgive you anymore!

ko: 이런.. 생각보다 강하군, 새로운 녀석이 필요하겠어
en: Huh... Your stronger than I thought... I'll need something new!

ko: 이제 나의 강력한 힘을 보여줄 시간이군.. 으하하하!
en: It's time to show my strength... Hahahaha!

ko: Log in every day to get rewards!
en: Log in every day to get rewards!

ko: 소환 버튼을 터치하여 새로운 마물을 획득해보세요.
en: Tap Summon to get new Demons
Steal the warm and precious home!
I can't move back this way...
The world is in my hands!
Log in now to get rewards!

ko: 소환 버튼을 터치하여 새로운 마물을 획득해보세요.
en: Tap Summon to get Firagon! Try your luck!
I'm looking for treasure!  I think it will take about an hour.
